nodes.text: Bladeback boars, also known as desert boars, were rare Tatooine animals related to desert razorbacks. During 1 ABY, one such boar terrorized residents of Tatooine, but was vanquished by the Hero of Tatooine.

Bladeback boars appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
